
# A Bayesian hierarchical model for estimating spatial and temporal variation in vegetation phenology from Landsat time series

This repository describes and documents a set of models used to estimate the spatial and temporal variability in vegetation phenology from Landsat data.

**References**

Senf, C., Pflugmacher D., Heurich, M. and Krueger T. (*in review*) A Bayesian hierarchical model for estimating spatial and temporal variation in vegetation phenology from Landsat time series. *Remote Sensing of Environment*
